title: Wireless Charging Edge AI-Based Educational Technology Design Workshop (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic AI concepts, understanding of IoT systems, and foundational blockchain knowledge
context.additional_context: Development of innovative pedagogical methods and enhancement of evaluation competencies by integrating wireless charging edge AI technology into language education

learning_goals: One can explain the operational principles of edge AI systems utilizing wireless energy harvesting technology
One can design and analyze energy-knowledge transaction incentive mechanisms in distributed learning environments
A project proposal can be developed to apply a blockchain-based P2P knowledge-sharing model to language education content
Optimal learning strategies under edge computing constraints can be validated using simulation tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
